creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell in memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
description: side chair; 'parrot back' with solid, vase-shaped splat; curved voluted cresting with raised shell in center, ending in clearly defined spirals; horseshoe shaped seat; front legs cabriole with shell design repeated on knees and terminating in Dutch angular feet; rear legs rounded and plain; solid spiral ears join front legs and skirting; upholstered in blue-green damask (modern)
title: Parrot-back side chair
